definition: non-Han people, esp. from central Asia/reckless/outrageous/what?/why?/to complete a winning hand at mahjong (also written 和[hu2])
(classical) this, that/he, she, they/(exclamatory final particle)/(initial particle, introduces an opinion)

sentences.english: They belonged to workers who built the pyramids of Khufu and Khafre.
sentences.chinese: 坟墓埋葬的是那些建造胡夫和哈夫拉金字塔的劳工。

sentences.english: Thieves have stolen the treasures, and they have stolen the body of Khufu himself.
sentences.chinese: 盗贼偷走了珍宝，还盗走了胡夫本人的尸体。

sentences.english: Support proper hoof function and alleviate the devastating results of ossification.
sentences.chinese: 支持适当的胡夫功能和减轻毁灭性的结果骨化。
